name: Cavalier
description: Cavaliers excel at mounted combat and protecting their allies.

3.name: Bonus Proficiency
3.description: Gain proficiency in a skill of your choice or learn one language.

3.name: Born to the Saddle
3.description: You have advantage on checks to stay mounted and mounting or dismounting costs only 5 feet of movement.

3.name: Unwavering Mark
3.description: Mark foes you hit, imposing disadvantage on attacks that don't include you and enabling a retaliatory strike.

7.name: Warding Maneuver
7.description: Use a reaction to add 1d8 to a nearby target's AC and grant resistance to the attack's damage.

10.name: Hold the Line
10.description: Creatures provoke opportunity attacks when they move 5 feet while within your reach, and your hits reduce their speed to 0.

15.name: Ferocious Charger
15.description: If you move at least 10 feet before hitting a creature, you can knock it prone.

18.name: Vigilant Defender
18.description: Gain a special reaction each round that can be used for opportunity attacks.
